Class Hallmark

java.lang.Object
Hallmark
public class Hallmark extends Object
Hallmark holds data to create story variations.

    • Hallmark

      public Hallmark(String[][] dain)
      Constructor with 2D array.
      Parameters:
      dain - Recieves data in the form of a 2D array and stores it to be mixed up into stories.

      Constructor with csv file name
      Parameters:
      filename_in - Recieves a csv file to convert into data.
      Throws:
      IOException - in the case of an error.
